I'm sorry for repeating myself but I fear that my last message
(http://grou=
ps.yahoo.com/group/junit/message/15268) might have been
overlooked. 

What =
do the people who haven't yet responded think about
@Before/@BeforeClass vs=
. @BeforeTest/@BeforeSuite? Please, give us
your comments. Nothing will hap=
pen if you don't speak your mind!


What is the overall opinion about Joe W=
alnes' aproach to flexible
JUnit assertions using assertThat? Do you think =
it is better or worse
than the current assertions? I would like to have it =
included in the
new release, would you too? David, why do you think using c=
onstraints
is heavy weight? 


And why
1) does junit.framework.Assert still=
 define assertEquals for
boolean, int, long etc. (autoboxing could do that;=
 in fact, deleting
those methods doesn't produce any errors)?
2) isn't java=
.lang.AssertionError used instead of
junit.framework.AssertionFailedError?
=
